channel.title: Ninja Workshops :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: The following workshops require Ninja skills, wax on, wax off.

item.title: Monitoring Horizontal Pod Autoscaling in Kubernetes
item.description: This workshop will equip you with the basic understanding of monitoring Kubernetes using the Splunk OpenTelemetry Collector

item.title: Making Your Observability Cloud Native With OpenTelemetry
item.description: Learn the concepts of the OpenTelemetry Collector and how to use it to send data to Splunk Observability Cloud.

item.title: Splunk Synthetic Scripting
item.description: Proactively find and fix performance issues across user flows, business transactions and APIs to deliver better digital experiences.

item.title: Distributed Tracing for AWS Lambda Functions
item.description: This workshop will enable you to build a distributed trace for a small serverless application that runs on AWS Lambda, producing and consuming a message via AWS Kinesis
